description: This contract is for the maintenance of exterior grounds at Gagetown
full_summary:
**Grounds Maintenance - Gagetown**
==============================

**Reference:** WS4326851627-Doc4328346913

**Solicitation:** WS4326851627

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** January 3, 2024
* **Closing Date:** January 29, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Amendment Date:** January 3, 2024
* **Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024
* **Contract End Date:** March 31, 2026

### Tender Status

* The tender is no longer active as it has expired.

### Industry Details

* **Industry Code:** UNSPC 72102905 - Exterior grounds maintenance
* **Trade Agreements:** The tender is open to bidders under various free trade agreements, including Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)

### Deliveries

* **Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick
* **Deliveries to:** Department of National Defence

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **Contact:** Kate Mintzer (SPAC/PSPC), [kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

* **Tender Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18414952?extsite=MTg0MTQ5NTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Attachment:** None
